hero.subtitle: Our IoT water quality sensor works with MycroFish to monitor the quality of water and increase the aquaculture yield in environmentally conscious manner

feature.title: Performance

feature.title: Low Cost
feature.subtitle: Efficient energy usage
feature.desc: With only 110 watts, MycroFish's performance is equivalent to an aerator requiring 4x more power

feature.title: Balance dan Flex
feature.subtitle: Floating system designed to fit every pond condition
feature.desc: The submersible pump installation which floats in the middle of the pond allows MycroFish to generate current without causing upwelling

hero.title: An Investment For The Best of Both Worlds
hero.desc: Increase Aquaculture Productivity and Protect Aquatic Ecosystems With Us

founder.desc: Fajar Sidik Abdullah Kelana was a son of a farmer who was born and raised in Sragen, Central Java. After graduating from Mechanical Engineering UGM, Fajar continued his studies in the field of Innovation Management & Product Development at the KTH Royal Institute of Technology in Sweden. He uses the knowledge he gained to come back to his nation and improve the food system in Indonesia by creating innovative technologies in agricultural and fishery production, namely Banoo.

point.title: Realizing national and regional food security
point.desc: In line with the first SDG point and the Government's Gemar Makan Ikan (GEMARIKAN) program, Banoo has a mission to make aquaculture as Indonesia's leading food sector so that people can enjoy a high quality, high quantity source of protein produced by themselves.

point.title: Improving water quality, preserving the planet
point.desc: Our development focus is not only on profit, but also on preserving the environment, both for life above and below water.

Killing two birds with one stone. We manifest this proverb by creating energy-efficient innovations and using alternative energy so that farmers can cut production costs while creating a sustainable cultivation system.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.desc: If you are a fish farmer, an aquaculture company, an institution or company who have programme in aquaculture sector, or just someone interested in what we are doing, donâ€™t hesitate to reach out and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

sent.title: Hello, Kawan Banoo!

career.title: Internship Opportunity at Banoo
career.subtitle: Banoo Inovasi Indonesia opens opportunities for Internship or Fieldwork Study according to the needs of students which will be matched with available positions and ongoing projects.
career.desc_0: Internship positions currently available at Banoo are
career.desc_1: Project Design & Numerical Simulation, Project Research & Marketing in Aquaculture, Finance,

qualification.title: Required qualifications:
qualification.desc_00: Active university students in Indonesia (preferably domiciled or currently residing in Yogyakarta and Klaten)

qualification.desc_13: an interest in the world of fisheries.
